```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: random-generator
spec:
  selector:                ![1](assets/1.png)
    app: random-generator
  ports:
  - port: 80               ![2](assets/2.png)
    targetPort: 8080       ![3](assets/3.png)
    protocol: TCP
```

```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: external-service
spec:
  type: ClusterIP
  ports:
  - protocol: TCP
    port: 80
```

```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Endpoints
metadata:
  name: external-service   ![1](assets/1.png)
subsets:
  - addresses:
    - ip: 1.1.1.1
    - ip: 2.2.2.2
    ports:
    - port: 8080
```

```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: database-service
spec:
  type: ExternalName
  externalName: my.database.example.com
  ports:
  - port: 80
```

```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: random-generator
spec:
  type: NodePort           ![1](assets/1.png)
  selector:
    app: random-generator
  ports:
  - port: 80
    targetPort: 8080
    nodePort: 30036        ![2](assets/2.png)
    protocol: TCP
```

```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: random-generator
spec:
  type: LoadBalancer
  clusterIP: 10.0.171.239      ![1](assets/1.png)
  loadBalancerIP: 78.11.24.19
  selector:
    app: random-generator
  ports:
  - port: 80
    targetPort: 8080
status:                        ![2](assets/2.png)
  loadBalancer:
    ingress:
    - ip: 146.148.47.155
```

```
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1beta1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  name: random-generator
spec:
  backend:
    serviceName: random-generator
    servicePort: 8080
```

```
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1beta1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  name: random-generator
  annotations:
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /
spec:
  rules:                       ![1](assets/1.png)
  - http:
      paths:
      - path: /                ![2](assets/2.png)
        backend:
          serviceName: random-generator
          servicePort: 8080
      - path: /cluster-status  ![3](assets/3.png)
        backend:
          serviceName: cluster-status
          servicePort: 80
```
